mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.company_name as "company_name", c.company_photo as "company_photo", e.employment_title as "employment_title", e.employment_contents as "employment_contents", c.company_id as "company_id", e.hope_job, e.employment_id as "employment_id" FROM company c Join employments e ON c.company_id = e.company_id Join resume r ON e.hope_job = r.hope_job WHERE r.member_id = #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select e.EMPLOYMENT_ID as "employment_id", e.EMPLOYMENT_TITLE,e.EMPLOYMENT_CONTENTS,e.HOPE_CAREER,e.HOPE_GRADUATE, e.COMPLETE, (select code_name from code where code_id = hope_job ) as JOB_NAME, e.HOPE_JOB_POSITION,e.HOPE_JOB,e.HOPE_LOCATION,e.HOPE_WORK_TYPE,e.EMPLOYMENT_PREFER,e.EMPLOYMENT_TIME,e.HOPE_SALARY, c.COMPANY_NAME,c.COMPANY_TEL,c.COMPANY_EMAIL,c.CEO_NAME,c.BUSINESS_TYPE, c.COMPANY_ADDR,c.COMPANY_BIRTH,c.COMPANY_SALES, c.HOMEPAGE,c.COMPANY_DATE, c.COMPANY_PHOTO, c.COMPANY_ID as "company_id" from employments e, company c where e.company_id = c.company_id and e.employment_id = #{employment_id}

select resume_id, member_id, resume_title, hope_job, hope_salary, hope_location, final_education, select_resume, select_public, resume_coment, (select code_name from code c where c.code_id = hope_job) as job_name from resume where member_id = #{member_id}

select video_id, video_contents, video_img, hashtag, company_id, member_id, video_location, (select code_name from code c where c.code_id = hashtag) as job_name from video where member_id = #{member_id}

select career_id, start_date, end_date, company_name, career_content, job, job_position, member_id, (select code_name from code where code_id = job) as job_name from career where member_id = #{member_id}
select skill_id, skill_name, skill_level, member_id from skills where member_id = #{member_id}

select habit_id, habit_name, habit_start_date, habit_log_date, member_id, cnt, case when trunc(habit_log_date) = trunc(sysdate) then 1 else 0 end as checked, round(cnt/CEIL(trunc(sysdate)+1-trunc(habit_start_date))*100) as per from habit where member_id = #{member_id} order by habit_start_date
mapper.insert: insert into apply (apply_id, apply_date, resume_id, employment_id, member_id, video_id) values (apply_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{resume_id}, #{employment_id}, #{member_id}, #{video_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT rn1, z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn1, x.* FROM ( SELECT a.apply_id, a.apply_date, a.resume_id, a.member_id, a.video_id, e.employment_id, e.employment_title, e.employment_contents, e.hope_career, e.hope_graduate, e.hope_job_position, e.hope_job, e.hope_location, e.hope_work_type, e.employment_prefer, e.employment_time, e.company_id, e.hope_salary FROM apply a, employments e WHERE a.employment_id = e.employment_id AND a.member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY a.apply_date ) x ) z WHERE rn1 BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

select employment_id, employment_title, employment_contents, hope_career, hope_graduate, hope_job_position, (select code_name from code where code_id = hope_job), hope_job, hope_location, hope_work_type, employment_prefer, employment_time, company_id, hope_salary from employments where employment_id = #{employment_id}
select COUNT(*) from apply a, employments e where a.employment_id = e.employment_id and a.member_id = #{member_id}
